description:
Bartolomeo and Tama look back on Luffy’s attainment of Gear Five and the battle against the formidable Kaido. They talk about the surprising features of Luffy’s new power and how the fierce battle reached its climax.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy-senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya Fourth!
Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto`s Secret Room 4!
Unterstützungsprojekt für Meister Ruffy! – Bartos geheimes Kämmerchen 4!
Épisode spécial. Le jardin secret de Barto, partie 4 !
ルフィ先輩応援企画! バルトの秘密の部屋4[フォース]!
